mapper.select: SELECT m.messageId, m.messageTitle, m.messageContents, m.messageSenddate, m.messageReceivedate, m.messageOpenstatus, m.messageSender, m.messageReceiver, u.nickName FROM message m JOIN user u ON u.userId = m.messageSender WHERE messageId = #{messageId}
